Articles.Content:
Anyone else where this thing is way oversized (at the same mass as the barometer and the thermometer) ? Is it meant to be that big?

![size_zpst19qvg3s.jpg](http://i1301.photobucket.com/albums/ag109/XthoxX/size_zpst19qvg3s.jpg)
also the processing in the lab takes a lot longer than all other experiments...

> 
> also the processing in the lab takes a lot longer than all other experiments...

That's always been true.
Yes it's meant to be that size.
